entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North Battleford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Battleford Airport 10:02 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 0.3°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 4.0 km
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: WNW 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow or freezing rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow changing to snow near noon. Risk of snow squalls this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light overnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 19 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
